name: Pokemon Red/Blue 3D
description:
I made the original Pokemon Red/Blue but in 3D. Since it was just a demo for fun, I recreated Pallet Town, Professor Oak's Lab, and the first battle against your rival in 3D.

If you like this game and are interested in game dev, make sure to check out the devlog to see how it was made:

Also feel free to check out my YouTube channel for more devlogs about other games I made:

https://www.youtube.com/TylerGreen
